meanings.sent1: Notwithstanding the rain, we decided to have a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: She went for a run notwithstanding the pain in her ankle.
meanings.sent3: Notwithstanding the late start, the team managed to win the game.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed beautifully notwithstanding the harsh weather conditions.
meanings.sent5: Notwithstanding the traffic, they arrived at the airport on time.

meanings.sent1: He was tired; notwithstanding, he continued to work on his project.
meanings.sent2: She was afraid of heights; notwithstanding, she climbed to the top of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: Notwithstanding his fear of spiders, he bravely removed the spider from the room.
meanings.sent4: The team was losing; notwithstanding, they never gave up and fought till the end.
meanings.sent5: Notwithstanding the challenges, she remained determined to succeed.

meanings.sent1: She wanted to go out; notwithstanding, she decided to stay home and relax.
meanings.sent2: He loves chocolate; notwithstanding, he chose to have vanilla ice cream instead.
meanings.sent3: Notwithstanding his busy schedule, he found time to help his friend with the project.
meanings.sent4: The movie was long; notwithstanding, it kept the audience engaged till the end.
meanings.sent5: Notwithstanding the distance, they managed to stay connected through video calls.
